page.title: 01BALMEDIE A GENERAL REVIEW
page.content: Balmedie is a relatively small dormitory town, 8 miles north of Aberdeen on the A92. At present there are 215 houses, a mixture of private and council owned. A rapid expansion is planned with 600 houses due to be built over the next few years. The area to the west of Balmedie is mainly farmlands with cereal crops and rotational grasslands. To the east lies rough grazing merging into a coastal dune system which has been developed for recreational purposes. There is one post office and a village shop, one chip shop and a motel.To the north there is an Eventide home.The majority of people who live in Balmedie commute to their work in Aberdeen.
